channel.title: Ens on Caroline Sorin
channel.description: Recent content in Ens on Caroline Sorin

item.title: Not in my Backyard
item.description: Not in my Backyard In 2013, an abandoned train station in a wealthy neighborhood of Paris is about to be replaced by a block of council flats despite the loud opposition of its neighbors. A few weeks before the works begin, I went there to immortalize this urban wasteland, symbol of the class war in the 16th arrondissement. 20 x 28 cm, 16 pages, digital print, saddle stitch binding, 2013

item.title: Mash Up
item.description: Mash Up Engraving on plexiglass, 60 x 80 cm, 25 unique prints, 2013 Printed at the Ateliers de Sèvres with the help of Olivier Moriette. And twenty-one digital patterns (created from personal architecture drawings), 2013 Other projects: Exemplaires The Belgian Cookbook The Machine in the Ghost Lato Dérive

item.title: Donne-moi tout ton argent
item.description: Donne-moi tout ton argent (Give me all your money) A magazine made with Andréa Corvo. An analytical approach of a French mall and its uses. 21 x 29,7 cm, 50 pages, laser and silkscreen print, perfect binding, 2015 Other projects: Intra-muros Confiture Not in my Backyard Top 10 Italia Exemplaires

item.title: Dérive
item.description: Dérive I chose not to choose. A reflexive look on where I come from and why I’m here. This book was made from personal archives (drawings and photographs) and failed silkscreen prints. 21 x 21 cm, 22 pages, laser and silkscreen print, perfect binding, 2015 Other projects: 92 110 Image manquante Long-Distance Memories Exemplaires

item.title: The Belgian Cookbook
item.description: The Belgian Cookbook Fifteen connected students worked on the same Framapad, trying out print design with web tools. Workshop under the direction of Stéphanie Vilayphiou and Colm O’Neill from OSP. Project made with So-Hyun Bae. 10,5 x 14,8 cm, 300 index cards and a paper box, laser print, 2015 About the workshop (articles in French): http://osp.kitchen/workshop/strasbourg-html2print/ http://comgraph.hear.fr/2015/03/html-sauce-cocktail/ Other projects: Exemplaires Lato The Machine in the Ghost Mash Up

item.title: Lato
item.description: Lato - A Small Open Source Dictionary Typographic specimen, poster and booklet at the same time. Presenting words of the open source world and their definitions, using the Lato free font. 20 posters-booklets of 29,7 x 42 cm (flat) and 10,5 x 14,8 cm when folded, laser print, 2016 Other projects: Exemplaires The Belgian Cookbook The Machine in the Ghost Mash Up Long-Distance Memories

92 110 Coming back to a childhood city where I never really lived, looking for beauty and memories in the suburban landscape. Digital photographies, 2015 Other projects: Image manquante Long-Distance Memories Dérive Intra-muros

item.title: Top 10 Italia
item.description: Top 10 Italia A typographic specimen of the Italia font, using emblematic lyrics of famous Italian pop songs of the eighties to present the typeface. The size of the extracts depends on the selling numbers of the artist. 18 x 27 cm, laser print, saddle stitch binding, 2017 Other projects: Intra-muros Confiture Donne-moi tout ton argent Not in my Backyard Lato

item.title: The Machine in the Ghost
item.description: The Machine in the Ghost A book confronting the ghosts of the past with those of the present. Putting myself in the shoes of an early 20th century medium, I too, manipulate pictures to show the world the utlimate proof that spirits are all around us (and especially in our computers). Book presented during the exhibition Haunted by Algorithms curated by Jeff Guess and Gwenola Wagon, at Galerie Ygrec](http://www.

item.title: Confiture
item.description: Confiture Confiture (which means “jam” in French) is a project for a periodical publication focusing on social, cultural and visual studies. It aims at analysing popular cultural practices in the present world and societies. Each issue is dedicated to a different question such as cultural legitimacy, digital communities or matters of representation in pop culture. The title refers to a French idiomatic expression basically saying that the less one knows, the more one brags about.

item.title: Image manquante
item.description: Image manquante Going through my archives, I selected the negatives of photographs that didn’t come out. Labelled as failed by the photo laboratory, they were not printed. By scanning and enlarging them, I gave them an existence. Project made during a workshop with David De Beyter 21 x 29,7, 4 booklets of 16 images, laser printed, 2017 Other projects: 92 110 Long-Distance Memories Dérive Confiture

item.title: Long-Distance Memories
item.description: Long-Distance Memories I go on a virtual journey through memories, pictures and Google Street View, to places where I have lived. Secretly hoping to find traces of what I left of me there. Photographs, video (13min), sound, 2017 Other projects: 92 110 Image manquante Dérive The Machine in the Ghost

item.title: Exemplaires
item.description: Imprimer l’exposition Catalogue produced for the 2017 biennal “Exemplaires, formes et pratiques de l’édition” (Exemplars, forms and practices in publishing). It presents the book selection of the Hear (on the topic of the exhibition catalogue). Analytical texts and reproductions of the books are accompanied by three interviews with artists and graphic designers. This project is a teamwork where we all four created the content (words and pictures) and designed the form.

item.title: Intra-muros
item.description: Other projects: Confiture Donne-moi tout ton argent Not in my Backyard Top 10 Italia Mash Up Intra-muros Where does Paris begins? Is the official border the only evidence of passing from one city another? Standing on this invisible line, I photographed each side of the city on the spot where it changes its name. 21 x 29,7 cm, 40 pages, laser print, saddle stitch binding, 2017

item.title: Is this you in the video?
item.description: Is this you in the video? Communication for Aram Bartholl’s exhibition at La Chaufferie, Strasbourg. Poster 60 x 80 cm, invitation 29,7 x 42 cm (flat), digital communication, 2018 Other projects : Exemplaires Lato The Machine in the Ghost Mash Up

item.title: Elsewhere
item.description: Elsewhere Internship and exchange reports loosely documenting my European adventures. Rotterdam : 12 x 15 cm, 42 pages, digital printing, wire o binding, 2018 Munich : 9,5 x 21 cm, 20 pages, digital printing, 2018 Other projects : The Belgian Cookbook Top 10 Italia Image manquante Long-Distance Memories

item.title: Crossing
item.description: Crossing Graphic design for the second issue of Volkswagen Group Culture magazine. Writing: Nansen & Piccard Artistic direction: Alexis Zurflüh and Ludwig Haslberger 21,5 x 28 cm, 64 pages, offset printing, Swiss binding, 2018 Other projects : Elsewhere Lato The Machine in the Ghost Is this you in the video?
